snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission adopted measures that would enforce marketwide circuit breakers and prevent erroneous trades from entering the system.
abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission adopted measures that would enforce marketwide circuit breakers and prevent erroneous trades from entering the system.

headline.main: Regulators Adopt New Tools to Prevent Another Flash Crash
headline.print_headline: S.E.C. Adopts Measures To Fight Market Volatility
